name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, Open Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
”Alexa, Tell Haiku Reader to give me a poem”
”Alexa, Ask Haiku Reader for a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Welcome to Haiku Reader Skill!
 
This Skill tells you random haikus (Japanese poems) in English. It is a simple and fun way to get inspired by Japanese wisdom at any time during your day. Get started by saying, “Alexa, open Haiku Reader”. Once you hear a haiku you can ask for another one by saying, “Alexa, open Haiku Reader to read me a poem”.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
